initialize(address[],string,string,strin.details: Function is invoked by the PoolTacker contract when a JustCausePool proxy is created.

params._about: ipfs hash of pool description of JCP.
params._acceptedTokens: List of tokens to be accepted by JCP.
params._erc721Addr: address of nft contract for pool.
params._metaUri: meta info uri for nft of JCP.
params._picHash: ipfs hash of pic of JCP.
params._receiver: address of receiver of JCP donations.

withdraw(address,uint256,address,bool).details: Function withdraws from Aave pools, exchanging this contracts aTokens for reserve tokens for user deposits.

params._assetAddress: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve
params._isETH: bool indicating if asset is the base token of network (eth/matic/...)*

withdrawDonations(address,address,bool).details: Function claims donations for receiver. Calls Aave pools exchanging this contracts aTokens for reserve tokens for interestEarned amount. Calculates interestEarned and subtracts 0.2% fee from claim amount.

params._assetAddress: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve
params._feeAddress: The address that collects the 0.2% protocol fee
params._isETH: bool indicating if asset is the base token of network (eth/matic/...)*

initialize(address[],string,string,strin.notice: Initializes the JustCause Pool proxy contracts.
